section.title: FindBugs Report
section.para: We use FindBugs to warn us about bad code practices. To obtain the report execute the findbugs:findbugs goal. FindBugs works with the compiled classes, so for a fresh report, the compile target must be invoked.
To inspect the code on the fly, run the findbugs:gui tool. Please note that it only shows the data from the previous analysis run.
